summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 (NA) CARRY-ON TRAILER 6X10CG. WHILE THE TRAILER WAS BEING TOWED BY A 2010 CHEVROLET COLORADO, THE WOODEN FLOOR BED DETACHED FROM THE TRAILER. THE TRAILER WAS TAKEN TO AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE BOLTS NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE TRAILER WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE AND VIN WERE NOT AVAILABLE.
